thread.title: Oscars 2017: the loved-up celebrity couples who hit the red carpet
thread.title_full: Oscars 2017: the loved-up celebrity couples who hit the red carpet

title: Oscars 2017: the loved-up celebrity couples who hit the red carpet
text:
Chrissy Teigen 
The Oscars is one of the glitziest nights on the Hollywood calendar, so it comes as no surprise that many celebrity couples enjoy a glamorous date night at the star-studded bash. Chrissy Teigen and John Legend were spotted joking and laughing together as they posed for photographers on the red carpet, before making their way to the ceremony where John will be performing. 
Meanwhile, Justin Timberlake showed off his mischievous side as he photobombed wife Jessica Biel while she posed on the red carpet, looking as radiant as ever in a floor-length gold gown. Both Justin and John are nominated at this year's Academy Awards – but they weren't the only singers whose spouses came out to support them. Sting was accompanied by wife Trudie Styler for the evening, where he has picked up a nomination for Best Original Song for The Empty Chair . 
Click through to see the full gallery of celebrity couples who looked as loved-up as ever on the Oscars red carpet… 
Justin Timberlake and Jessica Biel turned heads as they arrived to celebrate Justin's hit I Can't Stop This Feeling being nominated for Best Original Song. Photo: © Getty Images 
Leslie Mann and Judd Apatow looked as loved-up as ever as they arrived for the glitzy ceremony. The couple are set to celebrate an exciting milestone this year: their 20th wedding anniversary. Photo: © Getty Images 
Chrissy Teigen was supporting husband John Legend who will perform at the ceremony: the model admitted that John was very "nervous" ahead of the show. Photo: © Getty Images 
Matt Damon and wife Luciana Barroso left their four children at home to enjoy a fun night out in support of drama Manchester By The Sea, which Matt has produced. Photo: © Rex 
Sting was joined by his wife Trudie Styler : it was no doubt a particularly exciting night for the couple, with Sting picking up a nomination for Best Original Song for The Empty Chair . Photo: © Getty Images 
David Oyelowo , who will be presenting one of the prestigious awards, was accompanied by wife Jessica for a glamorous date night. Photo: © Getty Images 
Ginnifer Goodwin was joined by husband Josh Dallas as she stepped out to celebrate that Zootopia - in which she voices Judy Hopps - has been nominated for Best Animated Feature Film. Photo: © Getty Images 
Keith Urban was by wife Nicole Kidman 's side to celebrate the actress' nomination for Best Supporting Actress following her role in Lion . 
Michael J Fox was spotted with his wife Tracy Pollan at the star-studded event. 
Vince Vaughn and wife Kyla Weber had a glamorous date night at the glitzy bash, where Kyla turned heads with her elegant floral printed gown. Photo: © Getty Images
